subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Pinch-hitter Jon Jay delivered a two-run double in the eighth inning to help the St. Louis Cardinals hold off the visiting San Diego Padres, 4-3, on Thursday.
snippet: Pinch-hitter Jon Jay delivered a two-run double in the eighth inning to help the St. Louis Cardinals hold off the visiting San Diego Padres, 4-3, on Thursday.
